meanings.definition: Not able to be achieved or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: The dream of flying without wings is unrealizable.
meanings.sent2: The goal of reaching the stars is unrealizable for most people.
meanings.sent3: Trying to eat a mountain of ice cream in one sitting is unrealizable!
meanings.sent4: Her expectations were so high that they became unrealizable dreams.
meanings.sent5: The idea of time travel remains unrealizable in reality.

meanings.definition: Not able to be made real or actual.
meanings.sent1: The unicorn in the story is an unrealizable creature.
meanings.sent2: The magical powers in fairy tales are often described as unrealizable.
meanings.sent3: Imagining a world without gravity is an unrealizable thought experiment.
meanings.sent4: His vision of a utopian society seemed unrealizable in the current world.
meanings.sent5: The concept of perpetual motion is considered unrealizable by many scientists.
